text: Josef Gumpold (3 September 1908 - 6 December 1942) was a German skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. He was killed in action during World War II. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1942 deaths Category:German male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Germany Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:People from St. Johann im Pongau District Category:Austrian military personnel killed in World War II
title: Josef Gumpold
